product_overview: A cutting-edge web application built with Next.js and React, featuring an AI-powered app builder interface, interactive 3D elements, and a modern landing page with rich UI components and responsive design.
core_goals: Provide an intuitive AI-powered app builder interface with chat and file upload capabilities.
Deliver a rich, responsive landing page showcasing product features, pricing, testimonials, and compelling CTAs.
Integrate interactive 3D floating elements for enhanced user engagement.
Implement a comprehensive UI component library for consistent and reusable design.
Ensure a seamless user experience with responsive navigation, animations, and state management.
Facilitate robust and scalable app architecture using modern tech stack and best practices.
key_features: Main Landing Page with hero, features, testimonials, pricing, call to action, and footer sections.
Responsive Navigation Bar featuring glass morphism and scroll-based styling effects.
Interactive 3D Floating Elements built using Three.js and React Three Fiber for immersive UI.
AI-powered App Builder interface including chat functionality and file upload for user input.
Comprehensive UI Component Library built using Radix UI and Tailwind CSS covering buttons, cards, dialogs, forms, and many other components.
State management handled via Zustand for UI states and React Query for server-side state synchronization.
Custom React hooks for toast notifications and mobile device detection to enhance user experience.
Global styling with Tailwind CSS and custom animations ensuring consistent and modern look and feel.
Next.js app router setup with layouts and metadata for effective routing and SEO.
Utility functions and TypeScript type definitions supporting maintainability and developer productivity.
user_flow_summary: Users land on the main landing page and navigate through features, testimonials, pricing, and call to action sections.
Users interact with the responsive navigation menu to access different parts of the site seamlessly.
Users engage with 3D floating elements that respond dynamically with floating animations for visual appeal.
Users access the AI-powered app builder where they can chat with the AI assistant and upload files to build apps efficiently.
Users interact with various UI components provided by the UI library during the app building and site navigation.
State management ensures UI elements respond accurately to user actions and server data updates.
Notifications and toasts provide user feedback during interactions.
Users experience smooth transitions and animations enhancing overall usability and engagement.
validation_criteria: Landing page renders correctly on different screen sizes and matches design specifications.
Navigation bar responds to scroll events and updates styling appropriately.
3D floating elements load correctly on the client side without blocking main UI rendering.
AI-powered app builder processes chat and file upload inputs without errors and returns relevant output.
All UI components function as intended with correct interactions and accessibility compliance.
State management works seamlessly with no UI inconsistencies or data synchronization issues.
Toasts and notifications appear contextually based on user actions.
Global styles and animations function without visual glitches.
Routing works correctly handling all defined routes including error states.
TypeScript types and utility functions provide compile-time checks ensuring code quality.
